name: df-exid
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cexid, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))))
comment: A device to add an identity element to various sorts of internal operations. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
